mapper.select: select a.idx , a.title , a.price , a.contents , a.inday , b.title as category , c.title as subcategory from sincard a left join category b on a.category_idx = b.idx left join subcategory c on a.subcategory_idx = c.idx where 1=1 and card_stat = '0' order by idx desc
--coalesce : NVL select coalesce( sum(price), 0) from sincard where card_stat = '0';
mapper.update: update sincard set card_stat = '1' where 1=1 and idx = #{idx}
